metadata.description: Crosstown Falls, Halloween Eve. It's the last night of the condemned town theater, which is closing with an all-night Dracula-athon. But the small group of moviegoers suddenly find themselves trapped inside when the theater is surrounded by a horde of vampires. A deadly siege begins, and the moviegoers soon make the terrifying discovery that the night projectionist is himself a member of the coven. But is he friend - or foe?
metadata.name: The Night Projectionist
